component.name: RunMotevo
component.doc: This component runs motevo for weight matrix refinement. It also produces a positive predictive value vs. sensitivity plot and the logo of the refined weight matrix. For this it takes two halfs of the alignments (refined regions), the old WM and shuffled peaks as input. For the ppv - sensitivity analysis it predicts binding sites one the odd half and on the shuffledPeaks with the old WM. Then WM is refined with even half and predictions are computed again. Curve for both analyses are then computed by calling a peak a true site if summed transcription factor binding sites posteriors on a certain region are greater than a cut-off. The cut-off is varied from 0 up to highest scoring region to get this plot.

input.name: odd_file
input.doc: Half of alignments (from Splitalignments) used to predict sites on.

input.name: even_file
input.doc: Even half of Alignments from SplitAlignments. Used for WM refinement.

input.name: WM
input.doc: Wm to refine: either old existing one or the one found by PhyloGibbs.

input.name: shuffledPeaks
input.doc: Shuffled Peaks to predict sites on. From ShufflePeaks component.

input.name: WM2
input.doc: If this one is defined, a ROC plot is drawn for this (WM2) together with WM. If not defined, WM is refined (motevo) and ROC plot thereof is drawn.

input.name: UFEmodel
input.doc: File containing the UFE model. Only optional when ran without alignments.

input.name: BaseFrequencies
input.doc: File from BuildUFEmodel component containing the frequencies of A/t and G/C. Only optional when ran without alignments.

output.name: refWM
output.doc: This is the refined weight matrix.

output.name: Logo
output.doc: Logo of the refined weight matrix.

output.name: nonref_WM_Quality
output.doc: Quality value for non-refined weight matrix based on specificty sensitivity performance.

output.name: ref_WM_Quality
output.doc: Quality value for refined weight matrix based on specificty sensitivity performance.

parameter.name: mylogo_path
parameter.doc: Path to mylogo logo creation script.

parameter.name: minpostwm
parameter.doc: Minimal posterior of sites to be included for WM refinement.

parameter.name: wmdiff
parameter.doc: Maximal difference between old and refined WM. Convergence criterion. A smaller number would be better, but then it too often doesn't converge (annoying for automation).

parameter.name: aligned
parameter.doc: Whether input files (even and odd) are aligned or not (relevant for TFBS predictions).
